SELECT bq.`quotation_no` as quotationNo, bi.`contract_no`, bq.`quotation_type`, bc.`customer_name`, bc.`customer_nature`, bc.`customer_industry` , os.`office_staff_name` as officeStaffName, os.office_address as officeAddress, bq.staff_id, (SELECT bqd.details_price * bqd.`number` FROM busi_quotation_details bqd WHERE bqd.quotation_id = bi.`qutation_id`) AS sumQuotationPrice, bi.`contract_price`, (IFNULL(bpd.`sumPrice`,0) + IFNULL(boc.`sumPrice`,0) + IFNULL( bpc.`cost_price`,0)) AS allSumCost, (IFNULL(bpd.`actual_contractPrice`,0) + IFNULL(boc.`actualAllPrice`,0) + IFNULL( bpc.`actual_price`,0)) AS actualllSumCost, (IFNULL(bpd.`profit`,0) + IFNULL(boc.`profit`,0) + IFNULL( bpc.`profit`,0)) AS allSumMargin, (IFNULL(bpd.`actual_profit`,0) + IFNULL(boc.`actualProfit`,0) + IFNULL( bpc.`actual_profit`,0)) AS actualAllSumMargin FROM busi_contract bi INNER JOIN busi_quotation bq ON bi.`qutation_id` = bq.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_price_details bpd ON bi.`qutation_id` = bpd.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_outsourcing_cost boc ON boc.`quotation_id` = bpd.`quotation_id`
LEFT JOIN busi_parts_cost bpc ON bpc.`quotation_id` = bpd.`quotation_id` LEFT JOIN `busi_customer` bc ON bc.`customer_id` = bq.`customer_id` LEFT JOIN office_staff os ON os.`office_staff_id` = bq.`staff_id`
